resources.string: 1. When the game board pops up, use the hints to guess the certain Mobile Apps term.

2. When you guess correctly, the background color of the square will change to green. When you guess incorrectly, the background color of the square will be red. Use the "check" button to see your results!
3. The numbers for hints for across and down are delegated from up to down and from left to right (For example, 1 ACROSS is the top row) Touch and drag on the hints to view them all.
4. Repeat this process until you have completed the crossword puzzle.
